org.apache.heron.streamlet

Interface KVStreamlet<K,V>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Streamlet<KeyValue<K,V>>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    KVStreamletShadow

    @InterfaceStability.Evolving
public interface KVStreamlet<K,V>
extends Streamlet<KeyValue<K,V>>
    A KVStreamlet is a Streamlet with KeyValue data.
